title: Is CloudStack a serious competitor to OpenStack? - Quora

response.answer_text: In 2016, Looking back. The situation has started to take a shift. Cloudstack is still the way to build IaaS/Private Cloud quickly. However Openstack has gained its ground on stability - (still upgrades are a concern). If you want to gain more out of Apache Cloudstack, you may like this to: Apache Cloudstack + ActOnMagic's ActOnCloud: Be a SuperMan
Yes and probably.There's at least 10 (probably more) Public Cloud services based on Apache CloudStack and at least a few dozen (probably many more) Private Clouds built using ACS.
